00030 void ServiceProperty::Empty()
00031 {
00032     Length = 1;
00033     Name.Empty();
00034     Value.Empty();
00035 }

00041 ServiceProperty::ServiceProperty()
00042 {
00043     // Just call the empty function
00044     Empty();

00054 ServiceProperty::ServiceProperty( const SimpleString Name, const SimpleString Value )
00055 {
00056     // Call the virtual function SetProperty
00057     if ( SetProperty( Name, Value ) == false )
00058     {
00059         // Can not set the name or value for this property. Raise an exception.
00060         throw ServicePropertiesException( "Bad parameter(s) for the ServiceProperty constructor" );
00061     }
00062 }

00065 {}

00078 bool ServiceProperty::SetProperty( const SimpleString eName, const SimpleString eValue )
00079 {
00080     // First of all, empty the property
00081     Empty();
00082
00083     // Empty names are illegals
00084     // Name + '=' + value must be 255 long at max !!!
00085     if ( eName.GetLength() == 0 || (eName.GetLength()+1+eValue.GetLength()) > 255 )
00086     {
00087         return false;
00088     }
00089
00090     // Set Name
00091     Name = eName;
00092
00093     // Set length to the Value of the name
00094     Length = Name.GetLength() + 1;
00095
00096     if ( UpdateProperty( Value ) == false )
00097     {
00098         Empty();
00099     }
00100
00101     return true;
00102 }
00103
00104 bool ServiceProperty::UpdateProperty( const SimpleString eValue )
00105 {
00106     if ( Name.GetLength() == 0 )
00107     {
00108         return false;
00109     }
00110
00111     Value = eValue;
00112
00113     Length = Name.GetLength()+1+Value.GetLength() + 1;
00114
00115     return true;
00116 }

00121     return rvalue;

00157 bool ServicePropertyNotify::SetProperty( const SimpleString eName, const SimpleString eValue )
00158 {
00159     bool ret = ServiceProperty::SetProperty( eName, eValue );
00160     if ( Container && ret )
00161     {
00162         Container->NotifyChanges();
00163     }
00164
00165     return ret;
00166 }

00173     {

00223
00224 ServiceProperties::ServiceProperties( int InitialSize )
00225 {
00226     int i;
00227
00228     TXTRecordLength = 0;
00229     NbProperties = 0;
00230     MaxProperties = 0;
00231     Properties = NULL;
00232
00233     if ( InitialSize < 0 || InitialSize > 1024 )        // The smallest field is a flag of 1 car, so 2 bytes
00234     {
00235         throw ServicePropertiesException( "Too few or too many properties" );
00236     }
00237
00238     // Round size value to the next upper multiple of 2
00239     i = (InitialSize+1)&~1;
00240
00241     Properties = new OMISCID_TLM ServicePropertyNotify[i];
00242
00243     if ( Properties == NULL )
00244     {
00245         throw ServicePropertiesException( "Not enought memory" );
00246     }
00247
00248     MaxProperties = i;
00249
00250     for( i = 0; i < MaxProperties; i++ )
00251     {
00252         Properties[i].SetNotify( this );
00253     }
00254 }
00255
00256 ServiceProperties::~ServiceProperties()
00257 {
00258     if ( Properties )
00259     {
00260         delete [] Properties;
00261     }
00262 }

00264 int ServiceProperties::GetTXTRecordLength() const
00265 {
00266     return TXTRecordLength;
00267 }
00268
00269 ServiceProperty & ServiceProperties::GetProperty( int Elem )
00270 {
00271     if ( Elem < 0 || Elem >= this->NbProperties )
00272     {
00273         // We are out of band !
00274         throw ServicePropertiesException( "Out of band" );
00275     }
00276
00277     return Properties[Elem];
00278 }

00280 ServiceProperty& ServiceProperties::operator[]( const SimpleString Name )
00281 {
00282     int Pos;
00283
00284     Pos = Find( Name );
00285
00286     if ( Pos != -1 )
00287     {
00288         return Properties[Pos];
00289     }
00290
00291     if ( NbProperties == MaxProperties )
00292     {
00293         // We must grow, if necessary... We can not be over 1024 properties set...
00294         if ( (MaxProperties*2) > 1024 )
00295         {
00296             throw ServicePropertiesException( "Out of band" );
00297         }
00298
00299         // Ok, we will have Twice the current number of Properties
00300         int i =  MaxProperties * 2;
00301
00302         ServicePropertyNotify * tmpProperties = new OMISCID_TLM ServicePropertyNotify[i];
00303
00304         if ( tmpProperties == NULL )
00305         {
00306             throw ServicePropertiesException( "Not enought memory to grow number of properties" );
00307         }
00308
00309         MaxProperties = i;
00310
00311         // Copy all properties from previous table to new one
00312         for( i = 0; i < NbProperties; i++ )
00313         {
00314             tmpProperties[i].Copy( Properties[i] );
00315         }
00316
00317         // Set me as callback in all new properties
00318         for( /* i = NbProperties */; i < MaxProperties; i++ )
00319         {
00320             tmpProperties[i].SetNotify( this );
00321         }
00322
00323         // swap tables of properties
00324         // Free the previous one
00325         delete [] Properties;
00326
00327         // Set the new one as the current one
00328         Properties = tmpProperties;
00329     }
00330
00331     Properties[NbProperties].SetProperty( Name, SimpleString::EmptyString );
00332
00333     NbProperties++;
00334
00335     NotifyChanges();
00336
00337     return Properties[NbProperties-1];
00338 }

00340 const ServiceProperty& ServiceProperty::operator= ( const ServiceProperty& rvalue )
00341 {
00342     if ( rvalue.Name.GetLength() == 0 )
00343     {
00344         Empty();
00345         return *this;
00346     }
00347
00348     // Copy the ServiceProperty
00349     Copy(rvalue);
00350
00351     return *this;
00352 }

00354 void ServiceProperty::Copy( const ServiceProperty& rvalue )
00355 {
00356     // Copy only the needed bytes from the hash
00357     Name = rvalue.Name;
00358     Value = rvalue.Value;
00359     Length = rvalue.Length;
00360 }

00362 bool ServiceProperties::IsDefined( const SimpleString Name )
00363 {
00364     return (Find(Name) != -1);

00366
00367 bool ServiceProperties::Undefine( const SimpleString Name )
00368 {
00369     int Pos = Find( Name );
00370
00371     if ( Pos == -1 )
00372         return false;
00373
00374     // Ok, we will remove on properties
00375     NbProperties--;
00376
00377     for( ; Pos < NbProperties; Pos++ )
00378     {
00379         Properties[Pos].Copy( Properties[Pos+1] );
00380     }
00381
00382     NotifyChanges();
00383
00384     return true;
00385 }
00386
00387 int ServiceProperties::Find( const SimpleString eName, bool ReadOnly )
00388 {
00389     int Pos;
00390
00391     if ( eName.IsEmpty() )
00392     {
00393         throw ServicePropertiesException( "Bad parameter" );
00394     }
00395
00396     for( Pos = 0; Pos < NbProperties; Pos++ )
00397     {
00398         if ( strcasecmp( eName.GetStr(), Properties[Pos].Name.GetStr() ) == 0 )
00399             return Pos;
00400     }
00401
00402     return -1;
00403 }
00404
00405 void ServiceProperties::NotifyChanges()
00406 {
00407     int i;
00408
00409     TXTRecordLength = 0;
00410     for( i = 0; i < NbProperties; i++ )
00411     {
00412         TXTRecordLength += Properties[i].Length;
00413     }
00414 }
00415
00416 bool ServiceProperties::TxtRecordIsFull() const
00417 {
00418     if ( TXTRecordLength > MaxTxtRecordSize )
00419         return true;
00420
00421     return false;
00422 }

00424 const unsigned char * ServiceProperties::ExportTXTRecord() const
00425 {
00426     int i;
00427     int CopyHere;
00428     unsigned char * SetPropertyLength;
00429     SimpleString        TmpProperty;
00430
00431     if ( TXTRecordLength == 0 )
00432     {
00433         return (unsigned char *)NULL;
00434     }
00435
00436     if ( TxtRecordIsFull() )
00437     {
00438         throw ServicePropertiesException( "Properties list is too big" );
00439     }
00440
00441     for( CopyHere = 0, i = 0; i < NbProperties; i++ )
00442     {
00443         if ( Properties[i].Length != 0 && Properties[i].Length < 255 )
00444         {
00445             // Set the property length in the buffer
00446             SetPropertyLength  = (unsigned char*)&TXTRecord[CopyHere];
00447             *SetPropertyLength = (unsigned char)Properties[i].Length-1;
00448
00449             // Let's generate and copy the propertie
00450             TmpProperty  = Properties[i].Name;
00451             TmpProperty += "=";
00452             if ( Properties[i].Value.GetLength() != 0 )
00453             {
00454                 TmpProperty += Properties[i].Value;
00455             }
00456             // Copy after the length the value of the property
00457             memcpy( (char*)&TXTRecord[CopyHere+1], TmpProperty.GetStr(), Properties[i].Length-1 );
00458             CopyHere += Properties[i].Length;
00459         }
00460     }
00461
00462     return TXTRecord;
00463 }
00464
00465 void ServiceProperties::Empty()
00466 {
00467     int i;
00468
00469     TXTRecordLength = 0;
00470     NbProperties = 0;
00471
00472     for( i =0; i < MaxProperties; i++ )
00473     {
00474         Properties[i].Empty();
00475     }
00476 }

00478
00479 bool ServiceProperties::ImportTXTRecord( int RecordLength, const unsigned char * Record )
00480 {
00481
00482 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_MDNS
00483     int i;
00484     int NbKeys;
00485     char KeyName[256];
00486     char KeyValue[256];
00487     uint8_t valueLen;
00488     unsigned char *value;
00489     unsigned char **pvalue = &value; // in order to prevent dumb warning from gcc >= 4.1.2...
00490
00491     Empty();
00492
00493     NbKeys = TXTRecordGetCount( (uint16_t)RecordLength, Record );
00494
00495     for( i = 0; i < NbKeys; i++ )
00496     {
00497         if ( TXTRecordGetItemAtIndex((uint16_t)RecordLength,Record, (uint16_t)i, (uint16_t)sizeof(KeyName),
00498                 KeyName, &valueLen, (const void**)pvalue ) == kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00499         {
00500             // Is it a simple flag ?
00501             if ( value == NULL || valueLen == 0 )
00502             {
00503                 (*this)[KeyName] = SimpleString::EmptyString;
00504                 continue;
00505             }
00506
00507             // General case
00508             strncpy( KeyValue, (const char*)value, valueLen );
00509             KeyValue[valueLen] = '\0';
00510             (*this)[KeyName] = KeyValue;
00511         }
00512     }
00513 #else
00514 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00515     char * KeyName = (char*)NULL;
00516     char * KeyValue = (char*)NULL;
00517
00518     AvahiStringList * TxtRecordStringList = (AvahiStringList *)NULL;
00519     AvahiStringList * PosIntoTxtRecord;
00520
00521     // Empty properties
00522     Empty();
00523
00524     // parse file to construct avahi string list
00525     if ( avahi_string_list_parse( (const void*)Record, (size_t)RecordLength, &TxtRecordStringList ) < 0 )
00526     {
00527         // Could not parse string
00528         return false;
00529     }
00530
00531     for( PosIntoTxtRecord = TxtRecordStringList; PosIntoTxtRecord != (AvahiStringList *)NULL; PosIntoTxtRecord = avahi_string_list_get_next(PosIntoTxtRecord) )
00532     {
00533         // Get pair
00534         if ( avahi_string_list_get_pair(PosIntoTxtRecord, &KeyName, &KeyValue, (size_t*)NULL) < 0 )
00535         {
00536             continue;
00537         }
00538
00539         // Set this properties
00540         (*this)[KeyName] = KeyValue;
00541
00542         // Free KeyName
00543         avahi_free( KeyName );
00544         KeyName = (char*)NULL;
00545
00546         // Free KeyValue if any
00547         if ( KeyValue != (char*)NULL )
00548         {
00549             avahi_free( KeyValue );
00550             KeyValue = (char*)NULL;
00551         }
00552     }
00553
00554     // Free list
00555     avahi_string_list_free( TxtRecordStringList );
00556
00557 #endif
00558 #endif
00559 
00560     // Here everything goes fine
00561     return true;
00562 }

00584 const ServiceProperties& ServiceProperties::operator=(const ServiceProperties& ToCopy )
00585 {
00586     ImportTXTRecord( ToCopy.GetTXTRecordLength(), ToCopy.ExportTXTRecord() );
